00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00029 #include "kvi_kvs_variant.h"
00030 #include "kvi_heapobject.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 // This class must not have virtual funcitons nor destructor
00034 // Otherwise it will happily crash on windows when it is
00035 // allocated in modules and destroyed anywhere else around...
00036 class KVIRC_API KviKvsArray : public KviHeapObject
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         KviKvsArray();
00040         KviKvsArray(const KviKvsArray &a);
00041         ~KviKvsArray();
00042 protected:
00043         KviKvsVariant ** m_pData;
00044         kvs_uint_t       m_uSize;
00045         kvs_uint_t       m_uAllocSize;
00046 public:
00047         void unset(kvs_uint_t uIdx);
00048         void set(kvs_uint_t uIdx,KviKvsVariant * pVal);
00049         KviKvsVariant * at(kvs_uint_t uIdx) const { return (uIdx < m_uSize) ? m_pData[uIdx] : 0; };
00050         KviKvsVariant * getAt(kvs_uint_t uIdx);
00051         bool isEmpty(){ return m_uSize == 0; };
00052         kvs_uint_t size(){ return m_uSize; };
00053         void appendAsString(QString &szBuffer);
00054         void serialize(QString& result);
00055         void sort();
00056         void rsort();
00057 protected:
00058         void findNewSize();
00059 };
00060
